name: Dungeon Siege 3: Treasures of the Sun
name_original: Dungeon Siege 3: Treasures of the Sun
description:
Dungeon Siege 3: Treasures of the Sun is an action-RPG game developed by Obsidian Entertainment. It was originally released in 2011. Square Enix published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Dungeon Siege 3: Treasures of the Sun on PC and PlayStation 3. You can purchase the game on Steam.
